metadata.description: Comedy is Hard... but Dying is Easy! Carl Dixon is on the verge of comedy superstardom and he got there the dirty way: by stealing jokes. He's got a killer act, an ugly past, and more enemies than punch-lines. So when someone asks Syd "Sh*t-Talk" Homes—disgraced ex-cop turned bitter stand-up comic turned... possible felon?!—how much it would cost to have Dixon killed, Syd isn't surprised in the slightest. He's already got a figure in mind...
metadata.name: Dying is Easy
